banner.heading: Find travel insurance if you have a serious medical condition
banner.paragraph: Our Directory provides details of firms that spaecialise in offering travel insurance if you have serious or multiple medical condition
banner.register: Register or login on the directory

conditions.heading: Can firms on this directory help me?

questions.answer: Yes, if you have been refused travel insurance because of medical condition
Yes, if you have had insurance cancelled because of a medical condition
Yes, if you have have been offered insurance but had a medical condition excluded
No, if you are travelling against the advice of a medical practitioner

details.answer: All firms are specialists in providing travel insurance for people with all serious pre-existing medical conditions
All firms are authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA)
We donâ€™t provide quotes but show you key details of specialist providers that can help you
